name: Someone ruined the fabric of spacetime again
name_original: Someone ruined the fabric of spacetime again
description:
You're on your way to a grand adventure in this amazing platfo-... wait, nevermind, it seems you won't be having your "grand adventure" anymore seeing how a normal adventure requires spacetime to be intact.

my submission to the 3rd Brackeys Community Game Jam, and my first entry into a game jam, it can be improved in many ways, but the jam was enjoyable and i look forward to joining more jams.
